short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects the PHP Manual page to a specified PHP Manual language page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension remember the language you specify on the extension's options page.
It will redirect you to the correct PHP Manual language page.

e.g.
https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.echo.php
redirect =>
https://www.php.net/manual/ja/function.echo.php
